description:
After mutual confidences, Anne spends a June evening at Green Gables and attends Diana`s wedding.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: How Horrible It Is That People Have to Grow Up, and Marry, and Change!
Otona ni Natte Kekkon Shite, Kawatte Ikutte, Nante Tsurai Koto na no!?
大人になって結婚して, 変わっていくって, なんてつらいことなの!?
